issue.message: Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 3, "executor", in androidx.camera.camera2.impl.compat.CameraCaptureSessionCompat.captureBurstRequests) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 3, "executor", in androidx.camera.camera2.impl.compat.CameraCaptureSessionCompat.captureSingleRequest) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 3, "executor", in androidx.camera.camera2.impl.compat.CameraCaptureSessionCompat.setRepeatingBurstRequests) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 3, "executor", in androidx.camera.camera2.impl.compat.CameraCaptureSessionCompat.setSingleRepeatingRequest) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 2, "executor", in androidx.camera.camera2.impl.compat.CameraManagerCompat.openCamera) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 3, "executor", in androidx.camera.camera2.impl.compat.params.SessionConfigurationCompat.SessionConfigurationCompat) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions
